entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 07:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: N 10 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets before morning. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 20 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
